page.title: 03COMPUTERS
page.content:
In our survey to find how many shops in Blantyre and Bothwell use{computers we found that{Bothwell}had more shops using them. The types of shops using them were mainly banks & electrical companies as well as a jeweller. The types of shops in {Blantyre}using them were more department stores and banks. We found that smaller shops like grocers, newsagents didn't use them. Sometimes a shop you would expect to have a computer did not and sometimes the reverse was also the case.
{TABLE OF RESULTS} { {BOTHWELL}- 13 shops out of 18 use computers {BLANTYRE}- 8 shops out of 18 use computers
